story:
Let me transform this resume into a narrative story:

Meet a dynamic bilingual sales professional whose 20-year journey in sales is marked by consistent excellence and remarkable achievements. This story begins in the bustling streets of Chicago, where our protagonist first made their mark at Sprint PCS, earning coveted spots in the Presidents Club in both 1999 and 2000.

Their career took an exciting turn when they joined Verizon, where they truly began to shine. Managing up to 120 retail wireless locations, they became known for their exceptional ability to develop businesses and build lasting relationships. Their dedication didn't go unnoticed - they were named among Verizon's "Best of the Best" in the West Area in 2004, joining the ranks of the top 100 employees.

In 2006, seeking new challenges, they ventured into real estate, obtaining their license and quickly proving their sales prowess by generating over $2 million in volume within their first year. Their international outlook led them to earn the prestigious CIPS certification, allowing them to serve clients across 40 countries.

Throughout their career, they've maintained an impressive track record of exceeding expectations - notably achieving $1.8M in sales in a single month (July 2014) and over $3M in volume within just six months. But it's not just about the numbers; they've trained thousands of clients from Fortune 500 corporations, helping countless first-time homebuyers achieve their dreams, and mentoring numerous business owners.

Beyond their professional achievements, they're deeply committed to giving back to their community, serving on the Board of Directors for Family Link Kids Adoption and Foster Care, and actively participating in various professional organizations including the Young Hispanic Professionals Association and the Greater Austin Chamber of Commerce.

Their story is one of continuous growth, adaptability, and excellence, marked by a consistent drive to exceed goals while maintaining exceptional customer service. As a bilingual professional with strong analytical and communication skills, they've proven that success in sales is about more than just closing deals - it's about building lasting relationships and making a difference in people's lives.

Currently, they continue to push boundaries in international sales, bringing their expertise to an even broader global market, while maintaining their commitment to excellence that has defined their entire career.
